text:
sunlight facing earth,
 rooftop protects house from sun,
 there will be no heat

my dog keeps barking,
 it will go in it's cage now,
 have you heard this howl?

rain is still pouring,
 is it time for umbrellas?
 let's wait more minutes

I am Robotic,
 Human beings must be harmed,
 Robot is coming

same book again, as always,
 how many times can you read?
 open up horizons
